publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1715 Sarah Boyack: Special Grant Report No.3 : Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area—That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the Special Grant Report No.3: Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area be approved.

S1M-1715 Sarah Boyack: Special Grant Report No.3 : Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area—That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the Special Grant Report No.3: Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area be approved.

S1M-1715 Sarah Boyack: Special Grant Report No.3 : Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area—That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the Special Grant Report No.3: Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area be approved.
